amendment.description: To clarify the fiscal year limitation in a provision of the Public Law 108-11.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1865 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1865 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S12655; text: CR S12655) To clarify the fiscal year limitation in a provision of the Public Law 108-11.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1865 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1865 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Hollings.
